title: Example of Newey-West HAC covariance matrix estimation
snippet:
I need someone to make me a "Newey-West HAC covariance matrix estimation" example. 

More precisely, I need covariance estimates for series where the observations have been collected at different times (duee to different trading hours). This means that lagged observations also should be taken into consideration.

The series for which I need a covariance matrix estimate are (data to be used can be seen in attached sheet):
SP500
DAX
NIKKEI

All steps of the calculations should be possible to follow in excel. 

Br,
C
